description: This file defines a Zustand store for authentication management in a React application, including functions for sign-in, sign-up, sign-out, and session initialization, utilizing Supabase for backend authentication and profile data.

methods.name: fetchProfile
methods.description: Fetches user profile data from the 'profiles' table in Supabase based on user ID.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Recovers existing session and subscribes to auth state changes.

methods.name: signIn
methods.description: Signs in a user with email and password via Supabase.

methods.name: signUp
methods.description: Registers a new user and initiates email verification process.

methods.name: signOut
methods.description: Signs out the current user and resets the store state.
